content:
Ukrainian border guards destroyed the occupiers' equipment, turning into scrap SUV and UAZ Russian invaders.

About thisinformsState Border Service.

The staff has effective work of Ukrainian defenders.

"An SUV and a UAZ "loaf" of the occupiers were turned into scrap metal: the work of border guards-aerial reconnaissance of the Offensive Guard "Steel Border" brigade in the Kharkiv direction," the message says.


In the Air ForceshowedAs the air defense reflects the attacks of drones in the southern direction every night.
title: Our military turned into a scrap SUV and a loaf of occupants
description: About it reports the State Border Service. The staff has an effective job ...
author: Army Inform
